author: Techlore
description:
You've probably been using Peter Lowe's blocklist without even knowing it—it's integrated into AdGuard, NextDNS, uBlock Origin, and many other privacy tools. Henry talked with Peter at AFDS 2025 to learn what transformed him from someone who just hated ads into a "closet privacy evangelist."
